title: The Complete Play Is Almost Here!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Ruby-san, have you read the script for School Idol Rangers?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah! Ruby thought Mari-chan was the enemy at first. Ruby was surprised she turned out to be on our side!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ehehe, that’s actually her idea!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Really!? She’s amazing....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I’d like to finalize this script for the complete play. But what do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>There are a lot of lines for me, so Ruby is somewhat nervous.... But Ruby will practice lots and give it my best shot!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Knowing you, I’m sure you’ll be okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Hey, do you think Ruby should act like this?「Commander! At this rate, the School Idol Rangers will lose our radiance ai~! Please allow us to go to the sealed School Idol Temple ai!」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>It’s perfect!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe~. Ruby is so excited to do the play~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
